todos.title: Darkest
todos.body: You must be your very best at the very darkest moments.

todos.title: Hope
todos.body: One person can change the world by giving hope.

todos.title: Failure
todos.body: No matter how hard you try there will always be failure.

todos.title: Heart
todos.body: Measure a person by the size of their heart.

todos.title: Bed
todos.body: Make your bed right every morning.

todos.title: Head First
todos.body: Go head first into some things.

todos.title: Fear
todos.body: Don’t be afraid of the failures, they make you stronger.

todos.title: Sharks
todos.body: Don’t back down from the sharks.
